title: FS:  Old Judge SGC 60  Wheelock, price reduced
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  Old Judge SGC 60  Wheelock, price reduced
posts.post_content:
Great centering on this.  Could he one of a kind--I've seen "Wheelock hands on hips R.F." but not "hands on hips Rightfield."  $329.  Postage $3.  Update:  just added a better scan.

Greg--is that staining all across the bottom?

It looks darker in first scan than it really is.  This is more accurate:
